name: Safer in the Dark (broknecho)
description:
Safer in the dark (SitD) is a top down adventure game made for Ludum Dare 32 - An Unconventional Weapon. In SitD, you can close your eyes to avoid most dangers. The level can be completed in complete darkness which will reward you with a higher score.

Enemies will only track you if they can see you have your eyes open. Watch your step.
